pages.text: There are a number of resources that can be collected, although some of them require $(l:crafting/introduction)tools that can be crafted$(), specific $(l:rituals/introduction)rituals$() or $(l:spells/introduction)spells$().$(br2)Some resources are instead crafted, either through traditional crafting means, or again using special tools, or gathered from entities using special tools.

In order to gather the specific resource you will need to meet the pre-requisites for doing so.$(br2)For example, obtaining $(l:resources/bark)bark$() requires that you have crafted a $(l:crafting/armor_and_tools/knives)knife$() first, likewise $(l:resources/petals)petals$() a $(l:crafting/mortar_and_pestle)mortar & pestle$().$(br2)More complex resources will require more complex crafting systems, such as $(l:resources/runestone)runestone$() requiring a $(l:crafting/fey_crafter)fey crafter$(), or $(l:resources/mystic_feather)mystic feathers$() and $(l:resources/fey_leather)fey leather$() requiring $(l:crafting/armor_and_tools/runic_shears)runic shears$().

Regardless of its source, every $(cat:resources)resource$() will list how it can be obtained in its entry, often times including a detailed template describing the process or providing a link back to the ritual or spell that creates it.
